mapper.select: SELECT users.id, users.login_id, users.login_pass, users.user_name, users.address_number, users.address, users.phone_number, users.age FROM users WHERE id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, login_pass, user_name, address_number, address, phone_number, age) VALUES (#{userLoginId}, #{userLoginPass}, #{userName}, #{addressNumber}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{age})
